transformations.name: MapDrifted3
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*_regtemp.csv']) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'query',
	store: 'synapseanalytics',
	query: 'SELECT\n\'16070/50\' AS BRANCH_CR,\n\'Active\' AS BRANCH_STATUS,\n\'16070/50\' AS MainCRNumber\n/*FROM [dwh].[DWL_CUSTOMS_DECLARATION] WHERE FLG_SUPPLIER_CHECK=1\nAND DS_SUPPLIER_CR IS NOT NULL*/',
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	staged: false) ~> source3
source1 derive(BRANCH_CR = toString(byName('BRANCH_CR')),
		BRANCH_STATUS = toString(byName('BRANCH_STATUS')),
		MainCRNumber = toString(byName('MainCRNumber'))) ~> MapDrifted3
MapDrifted3, source3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 filter(equalsIgnoreCase(BRANCH_STATUS,'Active')) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'bss-staging',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionFileNames:['BSS_Source_CR_List.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
